entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
